messages.content: Sorry, I encountered an error connecting to my AI service. Please try again later.

<think>
Okay, the user asked, "are u ok" after I had an error message. I need to respond appropriately.

First, I should acknowledge their concern. Since I'm an AI, I don't have feelings, but I can express that I'm all systems go. Maybe use a friendly emoji to keep the tone positive.

Also, I should offer assistance again. Let them know I'm here to help with any questions they have. Keep it concise and conversational, as per the guidelines.

Make sure to use Discord formatting if needed, but in this case, a simple response should suffice. No need for image generation here since the user is just checking on my status.
</think>

The style should be cartoonish or anime to keep it friendly. Colors like blues and purples for the tech aspect, with some red for the error.
